name: Region
description: Region

name: Actual Result
description: What was the result of executing this test case. If it matches the expected result then it is a PASS, if not then it is a FAIL.

name: Requirement Source
description: Where does the requirement come from?

name: Reference/Section
description: Use this field to capture the source of the specific requirement which needs to be tested.

name: Process
description: Process

name: Type
description: Requirement Type

name: Dependent?
description: Is this issue dependent on another?

name: Version
description: Give this issue a version number

name: Reason For Requirement
description: Reason For Requirement

name: Current # Tests
description: Current number of tests

name: Estimated # Tests
description: Estimated number of tests

name: Pre-conditions
description: What must be true in order to execute this test case.

name: Test Data Required
description: What test data do we need to have in order to execute this test

name: Test Steps
description: What steps need to be executed for this test

name: Expected Result
description: The outcome of the test in order for it to PASS.

name: Test Information
description: Test Information

name: Test Case Version
description: Assign a number to version this test case

name: Country
description: Country

name: Steps to Reproduce
description: Describe the events to reproduce the issue

name: Likely Root Cause
description: Likely Root Cause

name: Defect Type
description: Defect Type
